resources.string:
"Unknownphone.com is the largest community on phone search and the biggest phone spam directory in the U.K., United States, Canada and Australia. With more than 100.000 identified phone numbers in more than 20 countries.
CallBlocker is Unknownphone.com‚Äôs official phone block app and you will be able to access all of our services from your Android phone."
"- Twitter: @listaspam - Email: callblocker@unknownphone.com - Website: https://callblocker.org https://www.unknownphone.com"
Get in touch with the team
There is no video reward ready, please try again later
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Can you let us know what can we change so we can improve?
We are sorry to hear that
Would you mind leave us a review in the Play Store?
Tap Phone and then Call Blocking & Identification
You need to allow CallBlocker to block and identify phone numbers

"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."

New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
This option will block ALL your incoming calls until you deactivate it. Are you sure?
We need to access to your contact list to block any contacts

You recently checked this phone number in our website.

"Remember you need to Activate Call Blocking & Identification in your iPhone"
Be careful when using this option, it will block all your calls. Spam or not spam.
The only calls that will be allowed will be the ones from your country.
Block calls from phone numbers that are not in my contact list
The only calls we will allow are the ones from people saved in your contact list.
We will block all calls with No Caller ID and without a real phone number. Premium only.
We will block all calls with No Caller ID and without a real phone number.

string.name: iap.free_trail.explain4.message
string.b: Get unlimited credits with our Premium version.

resources.string: We just analysed your latest calls and found %1$d spam calls. Do you want to block them now?
Welcome to CallBlocker. We just blocked those %1$d spam phone numbers for you.

string.name: initial_spam_numbers.text3
string.b: They will not bother you again!

resources.string: Email address is empty or not valid
Password empty or not valid. Minimum of 3 characters required
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
There seems to be a problem with your Internet connection.
Go to CallBlocker and click in Permissions
We need to get you to give us access to block all spam calls for you.
We need to get you to give us some permissions to block all spam. Click here.
You need to authorize the notifications in Settings
To identify or block a call you just received, go to Phone.
Click on the phone you want to know more about.
Great! Now open CallBlocker and choose what you want to do with this phone.

"To activate call blocking services in your iPhone you have to do it manually.
Go to "Configuration.

Now click in Phone".
Maybe you need to scroll to the bottom a bit."
Now click in Call Blocking & Identification

Activate CallBlocker".
Now you are ready!"
In this screen you will see your latest calls and searches and how we filter them.
When you search for a phone number you will see this icon.
When you receive a spam call and we identify it, it will appear like this.
The number is the amount of times this phone number called you.
When you receive an unidentified call, it will be shown like this.
Click here to get the latest reports for that phone number.
Don‚Äôt forget to click on search to get the latest information for this phone number and report the call
Has this ever happened to you?
We all get calls from unknown numbers.
Now with CallBlocker and unknownphone.com you will be able to identify and block automatically spam and dangerous phone numbers.
Your data protection is very important to us and your contact list will just be stored in your iPhone and will never be shared or uploaded to any server.
CallBlocker needs to access your contacts list to do searches.
Enable for free the full protection to be automatically covered.
Do you want to be automatically protected against the most dangerous phone numbers in your country?
Great news! You are automatically protected against %1$d dangerous phone numbers in your area.
We update our list of dangerous phone numbers every few hours to block new threats, please allow CallBlocker to get automatic updates.

string.name: onboarding.intro.4.text.3
string.i: You can always update this list manually in the Protection section.

resources.string: To let us block calls in your iPhone you have to grant us access manually.
To allow us to Automatically identify all dangerous phone numbers you have to enable us to draw over window.
You are now automatically protected against %1$d dangerous phone numbers.
The dangerous phone database has been updated and your credit has been renewed
The dangerous phone database has been updated
Dangerous phone database was never updated.
You can only update the dangerous phone list one time per day.
You still have some remaining credit for this week.
You have no balance. Go Premium for unlimited access or wait %1$d days.
Great! You have unlimited credits to access all the data.
Your phone could be in risk. Please, enable automatic Call Protection to get the latest dangerous phone numbers in your country.
Automatically block all potential dangerous phone numbers.
Automatically block all potential dangerous phone numbers. Premium only.
Automatically identify all potential dangerous phone numbers.
Automatically identify all potential dangerous phone numbers. Premium only.
Every week you have 75 credits for free.
Link your CallBlocker account to your Facebook/Google increments your credit limit from 75 to 90.
Premium users among other advantages get unlimited credits.
- Automatic detection of up to 300 dangerous phone numbers in your country.
- Up to 5 results per phone number.

"Payment for auto-renewing subscription to CallBlocker will be charged to your Google account upon confirmation of purchase. Subscription can be managed and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to the Account Settings on your device. To avoid renewal, you must cancel at least 24 hours befour your subscription ends. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period."
You can cancel your subscription at any time. You will be automatically charged every one or three months, depending on your choice, until you cancel.
- Unlimited credits. Get information for all numbers you want.
- Automatic detection and block of up to 2000 dangerous phone numbers in your country.
- Access without limitations all our records for any phone number.
- Block No Caller ID/hidden number calls.
When you get new calls they will be shown here.
